FAIL_TO_PASS: when argument then included in helpInformation
when program has command then appears in help
when not enough width then no wrap
when custom usage and check subcommand help then starts with custom usage including program name
when enough width then wrap
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when add two commands with helpGroup then help contains group
when add custom help command then custom help command
when getOutHasColors returns true then help has color
when default usage and check subcommand help then starts with default usage including program name
when .helpCommand(name) then help command in group
when .helpCommand(true) then help command in group
when command with custom helpGroup then helpGroup wins
when command has aliases then only first appears in help
when set program name then name appears in help
when add two commands then help contains group with two commands
when add one command then help contains group
end-to-end: when option description is preformatted then manual format is preserved
when custom usage and check program help then starts with custom usage
when no .version then helpInformation does not include version
